DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare safety efficacy FS VH S/D 500 s-apr ( FS ) versus manual compression prosthetic expand polytetrafluoroethylene ( ePTFE ) graft placement .
DOC.brief_title: FS VH S/D 500 S-apr Vascular Surgery
DOC.criteria: Preoperative inclusion criterion : Subjects undergo vascular surgery ( ie , conduit placement ePTFE graft ) , include arterioarterial bypass , include : axillofemoral axillobifemoral aortobifemoral iliofemoral femorofemoral iliopopliteal femoropopliteal ( include knee ) femorotibial vessel bypass arteriovenous shunt dialysis access upper low extremity Signed informed consent Subject childbearing potential , present negative serum urine pregnancy test , agree employ adequate birth control measure duration study . Subject willing able comply requirement protocol . Intraoperative inclusion criterion : Suture line bleed eligible study treatment present surgical hemostasis ( ie , suture ) . ( A definition eligible suture line bleed provide study protocol . ) Preoperative exclusion criterion : Other vascular procedure surgical session ( stenting and/or endarterectomy artery allow ) Congenital coagulation disorder Prior kidney transplantation Heparininduced thrombocytopenia Known hypersensitivity heparin Known hypersensitivity aprotinin component product Known severe congenital acquire immunodeficiency ( eg , HIV infection longterm treatment immunosuppressive drug ( eg , organ transplantation patient ) Prior radiation therapy operate field Severe local inflammation operate field Subject pregnant lactating time enrollment Subject participate another clinical study involve investigational product ( IP ) investigational device within 30 day prior enrollment schedule participate another clinical study involve IP investigational device course study Subject previously participate study ( Protocol No . : 550801 ) , ie , subject enrol . Intraoperative Major intraoperative complication require resuscitation deviation plan surgical procedure Intraoperative change plan surgical procedure , result subject long meeting preoperative inclusion and/or exclusion criterion , ( eg , abandonment ePTFE graft placement )
